website_summaries.verdict: The clear barrel makes knowing when to refill a breeze and lets you see what's going on inside.
pros: Press comes with 12 different spritz cookie shape discs
Easy to switch discs thanks to the raised base design
Clear barrel so you can see what's going on
cons: Works best with dough made from recipes included recipes, so your own favorites may not work
If your dough is too firm, it may break the trigger

customer_reviews.title: Broke almost immediately on first use.
customer_reviews.text: Broke almost immediately on first use. The plastic tube screws on to the handle, but the threads stripped after the first cookie and just popped off. I was careful to make my dough on the soft side to avoid this (I had seen it in a few reviews but hoped I would get lucky) but it broke for me too. Disappointing. I would pay more for a press that was well made.
customer_reviews.author: S. Isom

customer_reviews.title: Plastic and medal construction - medal toothed rod breaks the plastic handle
customer_reviews.text: Good for a toy. Outer casing, handle, and gear is made out of plastic while the inner toothed push down rod is made out of medal. The result is that medal wins over plastic as the medal toothed push down rod breaks the plastic gear/handle leaving this product useless. Waste of money. I used it after the return date now Amazon will not accept a return on this item and it's headed for the garbage can. Buy an all medal cookie press.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Barber

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because Wilton has released some Christmas disks I was excited about but which don't fit my Mirro press, which I've used for 47 years. The directions are no help, telling you to match up arrows when there are no arrows. The disks don't stay in place and the plunger doesn't plunge. I went back to my tin Mirro immediately. A piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Frances Kuffel

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The purple knob on the plunger came off during the first use. I only used it for 3 months or so before the trigger exploded. Pretty disappointing considering it's a Wilton product that's been around longer than I've been alive. It should last longer than a few months and less than 12 uses.
customer_reviews.author: Honey

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: This did not work at all. I ordered it to replace an old one which has been lost in moves. The old one had a plunger that you pressed. This one has a trigger that looked like a good idea. I loaded it and followed instructions but no cookie came out. They had recommended their recipes so I tried that. Still no luck. I would return it but the postage would make it not worth the trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Hill

customer_reviews.title: Terrible press
customer_reviews.text: Did not work at all as expected. After 12 cookies the press stopped clicking and the dough was not separating from the gun. Instruction in the gun were unclear on how to improve it's performance. I was shocked as I've used many Wilton products in the past and I've never experienced one this dysfunctional.
customer_reviews.author: Gypsywind

customer_reviews.title: Good product but some quirks
customer_reviews.text: The 1st one I bought I learned that is the dough isn't on the softer size you run the risk of breaking the trigger which is what happened. Returned it and was sent a replacement (hey you don't know if you don't ask) and have since made sure to have the dough softer. Haven't had a problem since.
customer_reviews.author: Avido Lettore

customer_reviews.title: Works good, cookies looked great
customer_reviews.text: Depending on the company who sent this item, the reviews were skewed. I was nervous about buying a cookie press online (because they break easily) but this one works great. It’s so easy to use and the dough did not get stuck. It’s a few bucks cheaper than in a store, so it’s a win all the way around.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Lynn Vitale

customer_reviews.title: Handle Broke off After Two Challenging Uses
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to have for Christmas cookie baking. Used it for one batch and it was not easy to operate. I watched a video to make sure it wasn’t operator error, and I found I was not making mistakes. The handle/crank failed to press out enough dough to make a consistent-sized batch of cookies. Frustrated I gave up. Yesterday I decided to try again with a different less-firm dough. This time, the plastic handle popped and cracked and fell off. This is probably because the inside gears were defective and too much pressure was being applied to the handle causing it to fall off. I got close-to no use of this product before deciding it’s going to the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy well made, cleans easily.
customer_reviews.text: I added a picture of my very first attempt at using a cookie press. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Walsh

customer_reviews.title: Not at all easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is easy to set up but not at all to use. Trying to match a batch of cookies I'll have to scrap too many of them because they wont come off of the press. Last time I made cookies I had to double press each one which made them bigger/thicker with a consistency I didn't care for. Trying to work with this thing makes me feel like a true amateur because it should be so simple. I'll be happy when the holiday season is over, I'll never pick this thing up again, and hopefully find a decent one before the next season.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Good cookie press
customer_reviews.text: I was unsure as to order this because of the mixed reviews. I was trying to find a replacement for my pampered chef press which I have had forever. Upon delivery, I wanted to try it asap to see if it worked. I made my usual cookie dough recipe and I have to say, it worked like a charm. The cookies came out very easily and true to shape. I made an entire batch with no difficulty. My granddaughter helped me and she was the decorator. It was easy to clean. I would recommend this press.
customer_reviews.author: Annmarie

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart during second use
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money! Yes, I bought it because it wasn't expensive. But I assumed it would at least get me through the season. Instead, it broke into pieces the second time I used it. Very disappointing for me, more disappointing for the 4-year old standing next to me. Junk!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Johnson

customer_reviews.title: works good for pressed cookies. heavy material, not cheap and flimsy
customer_reviews.text: works good. sometimes the cookie doesn’t press out and you have to mess with it. also one pump will make a small cookie. you almost have to do 2 pumps and then they lose some of their shape worth the price if you love these cookies. washes up easy and simple to put together
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good press
customer_reviews.text: After purchasing 3 different brands of cookie press I finally found one that works. The only complaint I have is their recipe was not very good. But next time I will use a different recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Kaiser

customer_reviews.title: Easier to use than my OLD one -- not perfect, but will learn which discs are best to use !
customer_reviews.text: Made and gave nice boxes of a variety of cookies - everone seemed very happy with variety of cookies and even sent me pictures of empty boxes - the cookie press ones have always been part of my selection - didn't feel like washing press again after doing green trees - so just added last of pink and changed disc to try out - discovered they actually were pretty, so may do on purpose for Spring cookies
customer_reviews.author: Larelle Whetsell

customer_reviews.title: Makes cookie making easy and fun
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well, itnis a little tricky loading the gun however once you get the hang it works like a charm and it is very easy moving from 1 cutter to another. The heart shape cutter requires a little practice to know how much to squeeze
customer_reviews.author: Stephannie

customer_reviews.title: wonderfull cookie press
customer_reviews.text: Haven't seen a better press for years. Plastic cylinder is nice and thick not flimsy. Metal ends and padded trigger rounds out a great press. Put cookies sheets in freezer for 10 minutes before pressing cookies and they will stick easier and make using a press a lot easier.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Zietz

customer_reviews.title: Make great cookies for cookie exchange!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for daughter in law to make cookies for cookie exchange. She made test cookies, read instructions and recipes. They turned out great!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: sj313

customer_reviews.title: Wilton Preferred Cookie Press
customer_reviews.text: I should’ve read prior reviews! This is being returned for not working. I followed exact directions & used their recipe & the dough gets stuck & does not drop down on baking sheet. Worthless! Look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Simone A.

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this press!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have made spritz cookies for years, first with a cookie press that lasted over 20yrs & then with a battery operated press that lasted for at least 10yrs. I bought this one & hated it the first time I used it. The dough's apparently too stiff for it. I had to us 2 hands to try to squeeze the handle & somehow push on the plunger at the same time. VERY DISAPPOINTED & a waste of money!!!
customer_reviews.author: M. Colleen Arnold

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money and effort. Buy only and only if you are a baking expert.
customer_reviews.text: Press does not function properly. Even after following exact recipes from Wilton site only 2 shapes work. I would have been better ordering cookie cutter and getting better shapes. Too much effort and the result is not what you expect. I suggest buy a cookie cutter. After one lot of press is done if you do not clean the next batch would be even harder. Cylinder and discs are of good quality but the press mechanism is poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Priyanka

customer_reviews.title: I love how it came with many different discs
customer_reviews.text: I love how it came with many different discs. It is well put together much better than the previous model. Made my spritz cookies a breeze. I ordered the fit right Christmas discs to go with it.
customer_reviews.author: Britney Collis

customer_reviews.title: This cookie press is handy, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cookie press for myself as had one years ago and loved it. This particular product has so many more features about it that I love and I would highly recommend it. I love the fact that you can squeeze out your cookies whereas my old one was a twist type.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: So disappointed as this product is so difficult to use. I tried it twice and both cookie press recipes would not work with this press. Very sad that it didn't work.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Farzetta

customer_reviews.title: Love it- so fun!!
customer_reviews.text: It’s so easy to use! Wish it held more dough lol- the kids loved it too! The cookies are kind of small- about the size of the palm of your hand- maybe one bite or two at most😆. You can always double squeeze and they turn out bigger though! Definitely use a pan they can stick to so the shape stays in place!
customer_reviews.author: Rosebud

customer_reviews.title: Worst cookie press
customer_reviews.text: Worst cookie press ever. I make spritz cookies every year and two years ago mine broke which was an electric one. So last year my kids bought me this one and my kids made cookies with it last year. Boxed it up for the year take it out this year and doesn’t work so purchased another one and its doesn’t work now either. So frustrated and will never buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Does not work properly
customer_reviews.text: The raised base design doesn't allow the dough to properly fully land on the cookie sheet with one click, just in pieces. It's a fraction too high resulting in two clicks and a heavier and thicker cookie. Bad engineering......sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: golfer

customer_reviews.title: It’s good not great
customer_reviews.text: After the 3rd batch of cookies the handle broke. It’s good not great. I use a traditional German spritz recipe and have continued to use my old German manual cookie press. This cookie press would be fine for lighter, fluffier doughs.
customer_reviews.author: Rhona

customer_reviews.title: So disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to receive this in the mail and make cookies. I was able to get one batch in the oven and was working on another and the darn thing decided it didn't want to work anymore. My husband tried it also, to no avail. I'm so disappointed in this product and wish I'd kept the packaging so I could send it back. What a waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Spoelder

customer_reviews.title: Great quality,price. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, price. So much easier to use than the older type, I suffer from arthritis and this has really helped me out. Good selection of cookie press designs. Highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Janae

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It’s been working great for 6 months of cookie making
customer_reviews.author: Prime Member

customer_reviews.title: Loved it! + Easy to clean +++
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this. It’s so easy to ise and, most importantly, to clean! Mu toddler and i had so much fun making cookies for christmas and can’t wait to make more for valentines, spring, thanksgiving, any occasion or excuse. I can’t find a down-side to this product. Loved it.
customer_reviews.author: Monica Isola

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this spritz maker we have had a few times where it didnt want to work as good but overall happy with our purchase loved the variety of metal stamps
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Lieske

customer_reviews.title: Not good enough
customer_reviews.text: Took lots of trials to get the cookies to come out the way they should. Every time I changed the disk or had to add more dough, I would have to go through lot of scraps before it started coming out.
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: Poor performance
customer_reviews.text: Uint has to be double clicked which perduces cookies that are twice as thick as they should be. You will only get 1/2 of the amount of cookies expected.
customer_reviews.author: pepe10

customer_reviews.title: ... expect much from this cookie press but it is perfect! Cookies came out amazingly and it’s easy to ...
customer_reviews.text: Didn’t expect much from this cookie press but it is perfect! Cookies came out amazingly and it’s easy to use. Would definitely suggest this product!
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Worth the money... my teenage son... was making cookies like crazy with this set.. and the little booklet gave him ideas for other treats ... so we use it often
customer_reviews.author: Diane Griffin

customer_reviews.title: Cookie monster
customer_reviews.text: Came late, couldn't use because I was on a deadline and product came three days after it was supposed to. Instead of sending back I kept i till next year
customer_reviews.author: Mark A.DeSanto

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Very difficult to use. Kids couldn't do it. A cookie needed to be redone about 30% of the time, using their recipe.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi-in-NYC!

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: This is an awful product, the handle literally broke the very first time I used it. I was very surprised, Wilton usually has good products.
customer_reviews.author: Amber DeGroff

customer_reviews.title: Fun gift to give
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift. They have a lot of fun decorating cookies. Follow the directions and don't make the cookie dough too thick and this should last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item for myself to make xmas cookies. I make the recipe exactly as was stated. It was quite wet dough. So I added some more flour. Canister that holds the dough is very small. Dough would not drop off the gun. Had to click the gun twice to make cookies drop off. Sometimes they dropped off sometimes they didn’t. I sent it back for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann Joy Loser

customer_reviews.title: very disappointing
customer_reviews.text: I have used cookie presses in the past, this one would not release the dough onto the cookie sheet. A frustrating mess.
customer_reviews.author: Helga Wantschik

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my elderly mother. She hasn’t complained about anything thus far so 5 stars it is
customer_reviews.author: Rae D.

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and fun
customer_reviews.text: Great and easy to use for Christmas cookies. Had a lot of different plates to use.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, I bought this product for an event but It did not arrive in time so I just got around to using it. When I went to make cookies, it would not press the dough out of the top. I have unfortunately missed the return date so I am now stuck with a cookie press that does not work. I understand this is partially my fault but wish it had just worked in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.... plastic
customer_reviews.text: Having grown up with the electric version of this product that you plug into the wall, I had hopes! It worked well.... for about 3 minutes. The electric one is easier, I’ll have to locate it. But even if all I got was new plates out of this product, I’m ok with it. I just wish it was made of stronger stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer DiMartino

customer_reviews.title: cookie press
customer_reviews.text: Hard to use and it broke. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. LGM

customer_reviews.title: Good choice. Sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Purchased as a replacement as the other one met an untimely demise. Our fault, not the product. Glad to have this one back. We had purchased a cheaper not as well made copy cat. It broke. We should have bought this one to begin with.
customer_reviews.author: James Palm

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This is so easy to use and makes cookies look like you put in so much more time. You get a cookie sheet filled and in the oven in no time!
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Allridge

customer_reviews.title: Worst purchase ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I've used the same spritz cookie recipe that has been passed down for generations in my family, my old all plastic wilton cookie press worked like a charm, I bought the upgrade... the press worked, but there is too much space between the disk and the cookie sheet they don't stick. I was so frustrated I went back to my old press and made cookies.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Jonas-Laurent

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Must be doing something wrong. Tried 2 different recipes but the cookies would not off to the apparatus. Followed instructions.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied !!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far a great deal and an excellent cookie press! I’ve had the higher end brands and threw them away. The Wilton for the money works excellent the only reason I gave it 4 stars is because the cookie size is smaller than the “high end brands”.
customer_reviews.author: DMO

customer_reviews.title: works well
customer_reviews.text: easy to use. turned making spritz cookies from challenge to fun.
customer_reviews.author: tmb

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good cookie press. Some of the design discs don't work well but it is a nice enough cookie press.
customer_reviews.author: Jeri Potter-Kullas

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the sturdiness of the cookie press. Stainless Steel is the only way to go, especially for cleaning up afterwards. Read the directions as it had one requirement (an arrow) you needed to follow for opening and closing in order to make the press work. Overall though - I enjoyed using it this past Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: DeeDee

customer_reviews.title: Works exactly as espected.
customer_reviews.text: First time ever using a cookie press. Good directions, easy to use. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Jim D

customer_reviews.title: easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This cookie press works great and is easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Kleiter

customer_reviews.title: Don't work
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited to get this, I made my fabulous cookie dough fil up the press and then...nothing. It didn't work! then I was like ok maybe my dough is the problem, I changed the dough and again the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Milos Obradovic

customer_reviews.title: Wilton is tried and true
customer_reviews.text: Only thing that was disappointing...could not tell which tips came with it. Did not have star tip which I use instead of wafer for cheese straws
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Law

customer_reviews.title: Not so much fun
customer_reviews.text: Thought this was going to be easier to use. Very hard to get dough onto cookie tray. Maybe it was my dough not sure
customer_reviews.author: Alana sienkiewicz

customer_reviews.title: Value for money
customer_reviews.text: This cookies press is very easy to use. I was pleased that little effort was required to operate the press. Ery good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Young

customer_reviews.title: The old version was much better.
customer_reviews.text: It was hard to work. The old version was much better.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Col

customer_reviews.title: ☹️
customer_reviews.text: This thing does not work ! The cookies will not release! I tried numerous suggestions!!
customer_reviews.author: Darla Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun and the kids had a great time with this.
customer_reviews.author: Rabunza

customer_reviews.title: cook baking at Christmas was sad this past year
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, cook baking at Christmas was sad this past year. Major let down.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Its so easy!
customer_reviews.text: Love. Why didnt I get this sooner!? I wish it had better instructions. But so easy to look up and fallow.
customer_reviews.author: kindra perez

customer_reviews.title: I’ve tried many
customer_reviews.text: I’ve tried battery powered, electric, and many manual cookie presses over the years. This one is the best. Buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Lots of great cookie shapes!
customer_reviews.text: This cookie press works great! I had to replace the last cookie press because I lost a few plastic discs in the garbage disposer! This one has metal discs and it makes a great variety of cookie shapes!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This cookie press is easy to use. I just wish that it held more cookie dough.
customer_reviews.author: M. Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Cookie Press
customer_reviews.text: Was just like the one I had had for the past 40 years. The handle is much better the my old one.
customer_reviews.author: singerbev

customer_reviews.title: Was given another brand that worked much better!
customer_reviews.text: The batter would stick and it was difficult to get the cookies to release from press!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled with this product
customer_reviews.text: The barrel is small so you need to fill often. Also if you don’t put the disc in exactly right the dough goes all out of the sides. A lot of fiddling around with this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: My wife made 100's of cookies this Xmas. She loves it.
customer_reviews.author: James Mends

customer_reviews.title: Best cookie press
customer_reviews.text: We had two store bought presses that have broken after short term use. This one is by far the best quality. If we had ordered this first we could have saved some money!
customer_reviews.author: Juanita Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: I just bought this cookie press a few weeks ago ...
customer_reviews.text: I just bought this cookie press a few weeks ago for my cheese straws. Not only was it very difficult to work with, but now it is broken. Money down the drain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great material good deal
customer_reviews.text: I have tried several kinds before all of them Was really bad material and I had to return them but this one is the best I have found so far
customer_reviews.author: N Abdalla

customer_reviews.title: Great for Christmas
customer_reviews.text: Bought this because I grew up on these cookies, Love this gadget!
customer_reviews.author: angie

customer_reviews.title: great in general
customer_reviews.text: I like it a lot yet sometimes the dough gets stuck and hard to push out
customer_reviews.author: mariam

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this press!!! Super easy to figure out and use and very easy to clean!! Definitely made making spritz cookies fun!!
customer_reviews.author: Halestorn817

customer_reviews.title: Does the job without causing frustration
customer_reviews.text: Made a batch of spritz cookies easily. Works like expected. A little hard to get apart after use, but definitely better than any other press I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M

customer_reviews.title: As it should be
customer_reviews.text: Works as it should. Good capacity.easy to fill, easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what hoped for
customer_reviews.text: I returned as it was difficult to utilize and quality felt poor. I was sad as the cookies were great size and good, but not giftable as they were supposed to be.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie cross

customer_reviews.title: Great cookie Press!
customer_reviews.text: My mother had broken her cookie Press. So I ordered this. It works great! I also trust the Wilton brand. Very good product!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: It fun using
customer_reviews.text: It mak s beautifully shaped cookies. I feel like a real baker
customer_reviews.author: Giselle

customer_reviews.title: Does not work as described!
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed! The description does not match reality. My kids were waiting for it but unfortunately they were disappointed that it is not working!
customer_reviews.author: Randa

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: This was difficult to squeeze and the dough would not come out cleanly
customer_reviews.author: Lori L.

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: The rubber tip fell off after one use, Cookies would not release from it to the cookie tray. And I do know how to use one. I have many Wilton products and have been happy with them but this one is useless..
customer_reviews.author: Gert

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you want to enjoy making cookies
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of junk. Makes what should be a fun cookie making experience a frustrating mess.
customer_reviews.author: j. gainey

customer_reviews.title: Total waste of money
customer_reviews.text: I got it as a birthday persent and I was so excited to use it but I tryed to use it and the dough would keep sticking to the press and it wouldn't come out I really don't suggest buying it total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Hanan hershkovich

customer_reviews.title: Don’t give up & do make like a barrel of dough  to work it.
customer_reviews.text: In the beginning I had a hard time when cookie dough it was coming out in clogs, took me 2 hours to do one tray, then I got it. The cookie comes out small also, I will keep trying, it got better .
customer_reviews.author: Lucille

customer_reviews.title: Butter must be soft!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure the butter is super soft or pressing cookie dough is difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes

customer_reviews.title: Best thing ever
customer_reviews.text: I love it I make a lot of cookies for the holidays
customer_reviews.author: Louise Miller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We were excited to make cookies, however the press didn't work - it dispensed the dough in shape if cookie but didn't cut it. We ended up using cookie cutters..
customer_reviews.author: A customer

customer_reviews.title: Cookie press
customer_reviews.text: Tried 3 different cookie recipes and none worked in this press. Dough stuck not matter what!! Sturdy and seemed well made .
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Great for baking
customer_reviews.text: Make alot of Christmas cookies. This was great to use for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Family Funtime with no mess
customer_reviews.text: Just bought it to make cookies with the grandkids and we are all excited
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Rosa

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good trigger doesn't work as well as I hoped ...
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good trigger doesn't work as well as I hoped but still a solid product . I have used it 6 times already!
customer_reviews.author: rewin

customer_reviews.title: Not easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I have used multiple cookie presses and this one was by far the most difficult to use. It would not let me press the cookies out of the tube. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Foster

product_meta.title: Wilton Preferred Press Cookie Press, 13-Piece
product_meta.description: Press to impress with this unique cookie tool. The Preferred Press Cookie Press makes it easy to make and bake beautiful spritz cookies with minimal effort. The press has an ergonomic hourglass shape so it's easy to hold, a see-through design so you know when to refill it with dough and a soft-grip trigger so you can press out dozens of cookies quickly. Comes with 12 Fit Right discs in assorted shapes.
feature_bullets: Make spritz cookies in all kinds of different designs with 12 different shaped discs and the Preferred Press Cookie Press
Raised base design makes it easy to switch out Fit Right discs
Cookie press dimensions: 8.75 x 11 x 2.6 in. (22.2 x 27.9 x 6.6 Centimetre)
Before first and after each use, wash in warm, soapy water; rinse and dry thoroughly
